author: bsunanda
body:
#### PR description:

Convert yet another algorithm from DDD to DD4Hep style. This is used for defining HO in test beam application

#### PR validation:

Tested using the existing xml files and a test script in the directory Geometry/HcalAlgo/test/python

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR:

Nothing special
title: Run3-hcx220 Transfer the DDD algorithm used for HO in TB  to DD4Hep
